title: Mary's sticky toffee pudding
description: Sticky, gooey and surprisingly light and easy, Mary's sticky toffee pudding is a winner. Baked in a large dish, this is a family-sized pudding, spooned out or cut into squares to serve.For this recipe you will need a 1.7-litre/3-pint ovenproof dish and an electric whisk.
ingredients: 100g/3½oz butter, softened, plus extra for greasing
double cream or vanilla ice cream, to serve
